title: Oda Cinnamon Nobunaga
synopsis: In the "one-of-a-kind samurai-general-reincarnated-as-a-canine comedy," Nobunaga perishes at Honnouji as in history, and reincarnates in modern-day Japan as a dog named Shinamon. Other Warring States era warlords such as Takeda Shingen eventually join him, also as dogs.
voices: ['Horiuchi, Kenyuu', 'Genda, Tesshou', 'Furukawa, Toshio', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Suzumura, Kenichi', 'Kumada, Akane']
staff: [['Takahashi, Hidetoshi', ['Director']], ['Horiuchi, Kenyuu', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Furukawa, Toshio', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Genda, Tesshou', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
